## normaliseCriteria() function

Normalise criteria.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function normaliseCriteria(criteria: string, delimiter?: string): string;
```

**Returns:**

normalized concat criteria.

## Remarks

Normalises criteria, as the order of filters should not matter, also gets rid of spaces.
